content.question: Which of the following best explains a long-term result of the development depicted in the excerpt?

choices.label: New labor demands resulted in fewer people working in agriculture.
New types of art emerged within urban African American communities.
New prosperity brought working-class citizens into the middle class.
New forms of mass media contributed to the spread of national culture.

content.answer: New forms of mass media contributed to the spread of national culture.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
